definition: owner/master/host/individual or party concerned/God/Lord/main/to indicate or signify/trump card (in card games)
name/noun (part of speech)/place (e.g. among winners)/famous/classifier for people

sentences.english: One or more host names can be derived based on the node name of the system.
sentences.chinese: 可以根據系統的節點名導出一個或多個主機名。

sentences.english: We provide this service, for up to five (5) hostnames, free to the Internet community.
sentences.chinese: 你可以最多同時擁有五個主機名，免費進入在線社區。

sentences.english: Substitute your fully qualified host name for the localhost.
sentences.chinese: 請用全限定主機名替換本地主機。

sentences.english: The hostname specified needs to be fully qualified.
sentences.chinese: 指定的主機名需要是完全限定的。

sentences.english: It allows administrators to limit the hostnames to which users can connect.
sentences.chinese: 它允許管理員把主機名限制在用戶能連接的主機名上。

sentences.english: It allows administrators to limit the hostnames to which users can connect.
sentences.chinese: 它允許管理員把主機名限制在用戶能連接的主機名上。

sentences.english: The colon separates the hostname from the display name.
sentences.chinese: 冒號將主機名與顯示器名稱分隔開。

sentences.english: The hostname and port can both be configured, however.
sentences.chinese: 儘管如此，主機名和端口都可以進行配置。

sentences.english: The host name needs to be a resolvable value.
sentences.chinese: 主機名必須是一個可解析值。

sentences.english: Scripts to deal with host name changes.
sentences.chinese: 用於處理主機名變更的腳本。

sentences.english: Update the necessary source files to reflect the hostnames of your runtime environment.
sentences.chinese: 更新必要的源文件，以反映運行時環境的主機名。

sentences.english: Hostname and port of the directory server to access.
sentences.chinese: 要訪問的目錄服務器的主機名和端口。

sentences.english: This command can read or set the hostname or the NIS domainname.
sentences.chinese: 此命令可以讀取或者設置主機名或者NIS域名。

sentences.english: Remember to substitute the fully qualified host name for the localhost.
sentences.chinese: 請記住用全限定主機名替換本地主機。

sentences.english: Also, the name should not contain any blank spaces or punctuation.
sentences.chinese: 同時，主機名也不能包含空格或標點符號。

sentences.english: The hostname of the machine gets printed as well.
sentences.chinese: 機器的主機名也會被打印出來。
